name: Louvre Museum Guided Tour
description: Skip-the-line guided tour of the Louvre Museum. See the Mona Lisa, Venus de Milo, and hidden gems with an expert art historian.

name: Santorini Sunset Catamaran Cruise
description: Sail around the caldera on a luxury catamaran. Swim in hot springs, snorkel in crystal-clear bays, and watch the famous Oia sunset with champagne and Greek appetizers.

name: Tokyo Street Food Night Tour
description: Explore the hidden alleys of Shinjuku and Shibuya tasting authentic ramen, yakitori, takoyaki, and matcha desserts with a local foodie guide.

name: Bali Rice Terrace Trek & Waterfall
description: Guided morning trek through the Tegallalang rice terraces followed by a refreshing swim at a hidden jungle waterfall. Includes traditional Balinese lunch.

name: NYC Broadway Show - Hamilton
description: Premium seats for the award-winning Broadway musical Hamilton at the Richard Rodgers Theatre.

name: Dubai Desert Safari & BBQ
description: Thrilling dune bashing in the Arabian Desert followed by a traditional BBQ dinner with belly dancing, henna painting, and camel rides under the stars.

name: Maldives Snorkeling with Manta Rays
description: Guided snorkeling excursion to swim alongside majestic manta rays and sea turtles in the crystal-clear waters of the Indian Ocean.

name: Jaipur Elephant Sanctuary Visit
description: Ethical elephant sanctuary experience. Feed, bathe, and learn about rescued elephants. Includes traditional Rajasthani chai and snacks.

name: Northern Lights Chase from Reykjavik
description: Expert-guided aurora borealis hunt through the Icelandic countryside with professional photography assistance and hot chocolate. Re-book free if no sighting.

name: Cape Town Table Mountain Hike
description: Guided sunrise hike up Table Mountain via Platteklip Gorge. Stunning 360-degree views of the city, ocean, and surrounding wine lands.

name: Amsterdam Canal Cruise & Cheese Tasting
description: Relaxing boat cruise through UNESCO-listed canals with local cheese, wine, and live commentary about the city's golden age history.

name: Barcelona Gaudí Architecture Walking Tour
description: Visit Sagrada Família, Casa Batlló, and Park Güell with an expert guide explaining Gaudí's genius and the Modernisme movement.
